098/**
099 * The Class {@link VmAccess}. The component supports the following
100 * configuration properties:
101 * 
102 *   * `displayResource`: a map with the following entries:
103 *       - `preferredIpVersion`: `ipv4` or `ipv6` (default: `ipv4`).
104 *         Determines the IP addresses uses in the generated
105 *         connection file.
106 *   * `deleteConnectionFile`: `true` or `false` (default: `true`).
107 *     If `true`, the downloaded connection file will be deleted by
108 *     the remote viewer when opened.
109 *   * `syncPreviewsFor`: a list objects with either property `user` or
110 *     `role` and the associated name (default: `[]`).
111 *     The remote viewer will synchronize the previews for the specified
112 *     users and roles.
113 *
114 */
115@SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.DataflowAnomalyAnalysis", "PMD.ExcessiveImports",
116    "PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects", "PMD.GodClass", "PMD.TooManyMethods",
117    "PMD.CyclomaticComplexity" })
118public class VmAccess extends FreeMarkerConlet<VmAccess.ResourceModel> {
119
120    private static final String VM_NAME_PROPERTY = "vmName";
121    private static final String POOL_NAME_PROPERTY = "poolName";
122    private static final String RENDERED
123        = VmAccess.class.getName() + ".rendered";
124    private static final String PENDING
125        = VmAccess.class.getName() + ".pending";
126    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES = RenderMode.asSet(
127        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.Edit);
128    private static final Set<RenderMode> MODES_FOR_GENERATED = RenderMode.asSet(
129        RenderMode.Preview, RenderMode.StickyPreview);
130    private EventPipeline appPipeline;
131    private static ObjectMapper objectMapper
132        = new ObjectMapper().registerModule(new JavaTimeModule());
133    private Class<?> preferredIpVersion = Inet4Address.class;
134    private Set<String> syncUsers = Collections.emptySet();
135    private Set<String> syncRoles = Collections.emptySet();
136    private boolean deleteConnectionFile = true;
137
138    /**
139     * The periodically generated update event.
140     */
141    public static class Update extends Event<Void> {
142    }
143
144    /**
145     * Creates a new component with its channel set to the given channel.
146     * 
147     * @param componentChannel the channel that the component's handlers listen
148     * on by default and that {@link Manager#fire(Event, Channel...)}
149     * sends the event to
150     */
151    public VmAccess(Channel componentChannel) {
152        super(componentChannel);
153    }
154
155    /**
156     * On start.
157     *
158     * @param event the event
159     */
160    @Handler
161    public void onStart(Start event) {
162        appPipeline = event.processedBy().get();
163    }
164
165    /**
166     * Configure the component. 
167     * 
168     * @param event the event
169     */
170    @SuppressWarnings({ "unchecked", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
171    @Handler
172    public void onConfigurationUpdate(ConfigurationUpdate event) {
173        event.structured(componentPath())
174            .or(() -> {
175                var oldConfig = event.structured("/Manager/GuiHttpServer"
176                    + "/ConsoleWeblet/WebConsole/ComponentCollector/VmViewer");
177                if (oldConfig.isPresent()) {
178                    logger.warning(() -> "Using configuration with old "
179                        + "component name \"VmViewer\", please update to "
180                        + "\"VmAccess\"");
181                }
182                return oldConfig;
183            })
184            .ifPresent(c -> {
185                try {
186                    var dispRes = (Map<String, Object>) c
187                        .getOrDefault("displayResource",
188                            Collections.emptyMap());
189                    switch ((String) dispRes.getOrDefault("preferredIpVersion",
190                        "")) {
191                    case "ipv6":
192                        preferredIpVersion = Inet6Address.class;
193                        break;
194                    case "ipv4":
195                    default:
196                        preferredIpVersion = Inet4Address.class;
197                        break;
198                    }
199
200                    // Delete connection file
201                    deleteConnectionFile
202                        = Optional.ofNullable(c.get("deleteConnectionFile"))
203                            .filter(v -> v instanceof String)
204                            .map(v -> (String) v)
205                            .map(Boolean::parseBoolean).orElse(true);
206
207                    // Users or roles for which previews should be synchronized
208                    syncUsers = ((List<Map<String, String>>) c.getOrDefault(
209                        "syncPreviewsFor", Collections.emptyList())).stream()
210                            .map(m -> m.get("user"))
211                            .filter(s -> s != null).collect(Collectors.toSet());
212                    logger.finest(() -> "Syncing previews for users: "
213                        + syncUsers.toString());
214                    syncRoles = ((List<Map<String, String>>) c.getOrDefault(
215                        "syncPreviewsFor", Collections.emptyList())).stream()
216                            .map(m -> m.get("role"))
217                            .filter(s -> s != null).collect(Collectors.toSet());
218                    logger.finest(() -> "Syncing previews for roles: "
219                        + syncRoles.toString());
220                } catch (ClassCastException e) {
221                    logger.config("Malformed configuration: " + e.getMessage());
222                }
223            });
224    }
225
226    private boolean syncPreviews(Session session) {
227        return WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
228            .filter(u -> syncUsers.contains(u.getName())).isPresent()
229            || WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
230                .filter(cr -> syncRoles.contains(cr.getName())).findAny()
231                .isPresent();
232    }
233
234    /**
235     * On {@link ConsoleReady}, fire the {@link AddConletType}.
236     *
237     * @param event the event
238     * @param channel the channel
239     * @throws TemplateNotFoundException the template not found exception
240     * @throws MalformedTemplateNameException the malformed template name
241     *             exception
242     * @throws ParseException the parse exception
243     * @throws IOException Signals that an I/O exception has occurred.
244     */
245    @Handler
246    public void onConsoleReady(ConsoleReady event, ConsoleConnection channel)
247            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
248            ParseException, IOException {
249        // Add conlet resources to page
250        channel.respond(new AddConletType(type())
251            .setDisplayNames(
252                localizations(channel.supportedLocales(), "conletName"))
253            .addRenderMode(RenderMode.Preview)
254            .addScript(new ScriptResource().setScriptType("module")
255                .setScriptUri(event.renderSupport().conletResource(
256                    type(), "VmAccess-functions.js"))));
257        channel.session().put(RENDERED, new HashSet<>());
258    }
259
260    /**
261     * On console configured.
262     *
263     * @param event the event
264     * @param connection the console connection
265     * @throws InterruptedException the interrupted exception
266     */
267    @Handler
268    public void onConsoleConfigured(ConsoleConfigured event,
269            ConsoleConnection connection) throws InterruptedException,
270            IOException {
271        @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
272        final var rendered
273            = (Set<ResourceModel>) connection.session().get(RENDERED);
274        connection.session().remove(RENDERED);
275        if (!syncPreviews(connection.session())) {
276            return;
277        }
278        addMissingConlets(event, connection, rendered);
279    }
280
281    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops",
282        "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals" })
283    private void addMissingConlets(ConsoleConfigured event,
284            ConsoleConnection connection, final Set<ResourceModel> rendered)
285            throws InterruptedException {
286        var session = connection.session();
287
288        // Evaluate missing VMs
289        var missingVms = appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().accessibleFor(
290            WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
291                .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
292            WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
293                .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
294            .get().stream().map(d -> d.definition().name())
295            .collect(Collectors.toCollection(HashSet::new));
296        missingVms.removeAll(rendered.stream()
297            .filter(r -> r.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.VM)
298            .map(ResourceModel::name).toList());
299
300        // Evaluate missing pools
301        var missingPools = appPipeline.fire(new GetPools().accessibleFor(
302            WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
303                .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
304            WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
305                .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
306            .get().stream().map(VmPool::name)
307            .collect(Collectors.toCollection(HashSet::new));
308        missingPools.removeAll(rendered.stream()
309            .filter(r -> r.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.POOL)
310            .map(ResourceModel::name).toList());
311
312        // Nothing to do
313        if (missingVms.isEmpty() && missingPools.isEmpty()) {
314            return;
315        }
316
317        // Suspending to allow rendering of conlets to be noticed
318        var failSafe = Components.schedule(t -> event.resumeHandling(),
319            Duration.ofSeconds(1));
320        event.suspendHandling(failSafe::cancel);
321        connection.setAssociated(PENDING, event);
322
323        // Create conlets for VMs and pools that haven't been rendered
324        for (var vmName : missingVms) {
325            fire(new AddConletRequest(event.event().event().renderSupport(),
326                VmAccess.class.getName(), RenderMode.asSet(RenderMode.Preview))
327                    .addProperty(VM_NAME_PROPERTY, vmName),
328                connection);
329        }
330        for (var poolName : missingPools) {
331            fire(new AddConletRequest(event.event().event().renderSupport(),
332                VmAccess.class.getName(), RenderMode.asSet(RenderMode.Preview))
333                    .addProperty(POOL_NAME_PROPERTY, poolName),
334                connection);
335        }
336    }
337
338    /**
339     * On console prepared.
340     *
341     * @param event the event
342     * @param connection the connection
343     */
344    @Handler
345    public void onConsolePrepared(ConsolePrepared event,
346            ConsoleConnection connection) {
347        if (syncPreviews(connection.session())) {
348            connection.respond(new UpdateConletType(type()));
349        }
350    }
351
352    private String storagePath(Session session, String conletId) {
353        return "/" + WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
354            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse("")
355            + "/" + VmAccess.class.getName() + "/" + conletId;
356    }
357
358    @Override
359    protected Optional<ResourceModel> createNewState(AddConletRequest event,
360            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
361        var model = new ResourceModel(conletId);
362        var poolName = (String) event.properties().get(POOL_NAME_PROPERTY);
363        if (poolName != null) {
364            model.setMode(ResourceModel.Mode.POOL);
365            model.setName(poolName);
366        } else {
367            model.setMode(ResourceModel.Mode.VM);
368            model.setName((String) event.properties().get(VM_NAME_PROPERTY));
369        }
370        String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
371        connection.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(
372            storagePath(connection.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
373        return Optional.of(model);
374    }
375
376    @Override
377    protected Optional<ResourceModel> createStateRepresentation(Event<?> event,
378            ConsoleConnection connection, String conletId) throws Exception {
379        var model = new ResourceModel(conletId);
380        String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
381        connection.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(
382            storagePath(connection.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
383        return Optional.of(model);
384    }
385
386    @Override
387    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.EmptyCatchBlock")
388    protected Optional<ResourceModel> recreateState(Event<?> event,
389            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId) throws Exception {
390        KeyValueStoreQuery query = new KeyValueStoreQuery(
391            storagePath(channel.session(), conletId), channel);
392        newEventPipeline().fire(query, channel);
393        try {
394            if (!query.results().isEmpty()) {
395                var json = query.results().get(0).values().stream().findFirst()
396                    .get();
397                ResourceModel model
398                    = objectMapper.readValue(json, ResourceModel.class);
399                return Optional.of(model);
400            }
401        } catch (InterruptedException e) {
402            // Means we have no result.
403        }
404
405        // Fall back to creating default state.
406        return createStateRepresentation(event, channel, conletId);
407    }
408
409    @Override
410    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops" })
411    protected Set<RenderMode> doRenderConlet(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
412            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, ResourceModel model)
413            throws Exception {
414        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Preview)) {
415            return renderPreview(event, channel, conletId, model);
416        }
417
418        // Render edit
419        ResourceBundle resourceBundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
420        Set<RenderMode> renderedAs = EnumSet.noneOf(RenderMode.class);
421        if (event.renderAs().contains(RenderMode.Edit)) {
422            var session = channel.session();
423            var vmNames = appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().accessibleFor(
424                WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
425                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
426                WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
427                    .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
428                .get().stream().map(d -> d.definition().name()).sorted()
429                .toList();
430            var poolNames = appPipeline.fire(new GetPools().accessibleFor(
431                WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
432                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
433                WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
434                    .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
435                .get().stream().map(VmPool::name).sorted().toList();
436            Template tpl
437                = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmAccess-edit.ftl.html");
438            var fmModel = fmModel(event, channel, conletId, model);
439            fmModel.put("vmNames", vmNames);
440            fmModel.put("poolNames", poolNames);
441            channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), conletId,
442                processTemplate(event, tpl, fmModel))
443                    .addOption("cancelable", true)
444                    .addOption("okayLabel",
445                        resourceBundle.getString("okayLabel")));
446        }
447        return renderedAs;
448    }
449
450    @SuppressWarnings("unchecked")
451    private Set<RenderMode> renderPreview(RenderConletRequestBase<?> event,
452            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId, ResourceModel model)
453            throws TemplateNotFoundException, MalformedTemplateNameException,
454            ParseException, IOException, InterruptedException {
455        channel.associated(PENDING, Event.class)
456            .ifPresent(e -> {
457                e.resumeHandling();
458                channel.setAssociated(PENDING, null);
459            });
460
461        VmDefinition vmDef = null;
462        if (model.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.VM && model.name() != null) {
463            // Remove conlet if VM definition has been removed
464            // or user has not at least one permission
465            vmDef = getVmData(model, channel).map(VmData::definition)
466                .orElse(null);
467            if (vmDef == null) {
468                channel.respond(
469                    new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
470                return Collections.emptySet();
471            }
472        }
473
474        if (model.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.POOL && model.name() != null) {
475            // Remove conlet if pool definition has been removed
476            // or user has not at least one permission
477            VmPool pool = appPipeline
478                .fire(new GetPools().withName(model.name())).get()
479                .stream().findFirst().orElse(null);
480            if (pool == null
481                || permissions(pool, channel.session()).isEmpty()) {
482                channel.respond(
483                    new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
484                return Collections.emptySet();
485            }
486            vmDef = getVmData(model, channel).map(VmData::definition)
487                .orElse(null);
488        }
489
490        // Render
491        Template tpl
492            = freemarkerConfig().getTemplate("VmAccess-preview.ftl.html");
493        channel.respond(new RenderConlet(type(), conletId,
494            processTemplate(event, tpl,
495                fmModel(event, channel, conletId, model)))
496                    .setRenderAs(
497                        RenderMode.Preview.addModifiers(event.renderAs()))
498                    .setSupportedModes(syncPreviews(channel.session())
499                        ? MODES_FOR_GENERATED
500                        : MODES));
501        if (!Strings.isNullOrEmpty(model.name())) {
502            Optional.ofNullable(channel.session().get(RENDERED))
503                .ifPresent(s -> ((Set<ResourceModel>) s).add(model));
504            updatePreview(channel, model, vmDef);
505        }
506        return EnumSet.of(RenderMode.Preview);
507    }
508
509    private Optional<VmData> getVmData(ResourceModel model,
510            ConsoleConnection channel) throws InterruptedException {
511        if (model.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.VM) {
512            // Get the VM data by name.
513            var session = channel.session();
514            return appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().withName(model.name())
515                .accessibleFor(WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
516                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null),
517                    WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session).stream()
518                        .map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList()))
519                .get().stream().findFirst();
520        }
521
522        // Look for an (already) assigned VM
523        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(channel.session())
524            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
525        return appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().assignedFrom(model.name())
526            .assignedTo(user)).get().stream().findFirst();
527    }
528
529    private Set<Permission> permissions(VmDefinition vmDef, Session session) {
530        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
531            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
532        var roles = WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session)
533            .stream().map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList();
534        return vmDef.permissionsFor(user, roles);
535    }
536
537    private Set<Permission> permissions(VmPool pool, Session session) {
538        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
539            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
540        var roles = WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session)
541            .stream().map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList();
542        return pool.permissionsFor(user, roles);
543    }
544
545    private Set<Permission> permissions(ResourceModel model, Session session,
546            VmPool pool, VmDefinition vmDef) throws InterruptedException {
547        var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(session)
548            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
549        var roles = WebConsoleUtils.rolesFromSession(session)
550            .stream().map(ConsoleRole::getName).toList();
551        Set<Permission> result = new HashSet<>();
552        if (model.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.POOL) {
553            if (pool == null) {
554                pool = appPipeline.fire(new GetPools()
555                    .withName(model.name())).get().stream().findFirst()
556                    .orElse(null);
557            }
558            if (pool != null) {
559                result.addAll(pool.permissionsFor(user, roles));
560            }
561        }
562        if (vmDef == null) {
563            vmDef = appPipeline.fire(new GetVms().assignedFrom(model.name())
564                .assignedTo(user)).get().stream().map(VmData::definition)
565                .findFirst().orElse(null);
566        }
567        if (vmDef != null) {
568            result.addAll(vmDef.permissionsFor(user, roles));
569        }
570        return result;
571    }
572
573    private void updatePreview(ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model,
574            VmDefinition vmDef) throws InterruptedException {
575        updateConfig(channel, model, vmDef);
576        updateVmDef(channel, model, vmDef);
577    }
578
579    private void updateConfig(ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model,
580            VmDefinition vmDef) throws InterruptedException {
581        channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
582            model.getConletId(), "updateConfig", model.mode(), model.name(),
583            permissions(model, channel.session(), null, vmDef).stream()
584                .map(VmDefinition.Permission::toString).toList()));
585    }
586
587    private void updateVmDef(ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model,
588            VmDefinition vmDef) throws InterruptedException {
589        Map<String, Object> data = null;
590        if (vmDef == null) {
591            model.setAssignedVm(null);
592        } else {
593            model.setAssignedVm(vmDef.name());
594            try {
595                data = Map.of("metadata",
596                    Map.of("namespace", vmDef.namespace(),
597                        "name", vmDef.name()),
598                    "spec", vmDef.spec(),
599                    "status", vmDef.getStatus());
600            } catch (JsonSyntaxException e) {
601                logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e,
602                    () -> "Failed to serialize VM definition");
603                return;
604            }
605        }
606        channel.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
607            model.getConletId(), "updateVmDefinition", data));
608    }
609
610    @Override
611    protected void doConletDeleted(ConletDeleted event,
612            ConsoleConnection channel, String conletId,
613            ResourceModel conletState)
614            throws Exception {
615        if (event.renderModes().isEmpty()) {
616            channel.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().delete(
617                storagePath(channel.session(), conletId)));
618        }
619    }
620
621    /**
622     * Track the VM definitions and update conlets.
623     *
624     * @param event the event
625     * @param channel the channel
626     * @throws IOException 
627     * @throws InterruptedException 
628     */
629    @Handler(namedChannels = "manager")
630    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.ConfusingTernary", "PMD.CognitiveComplexity",
631        "PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops", "PMD.AvoidDuplicateLiterals",
632        "PMD.ConfusingArgumentToVarargsMethod" })
633    public void onVmDefChanged(VmDefChanged event, VmChannel channel)
634            throws IOException, InterruptedException {
635        var vmDef = event.vmDefinition();
636
637        // Update known conlets
638        for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
639            var connection = entry.getKey();
640            for (var conletId : entry.getValue()) {
641                var model = stateFromSession(connection.session(), conletId);
642                if (model.isEmpty()
643                    || Strings.isNullOrEmpty(model.get().name())) {
644                    continue;
645                }
646                if (model.get().mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.VM) {
647                    // Check if this VM is used by conlet
648                    if (!Objects.areEqual(model.get().name(), vmDef.name())) {
649                        continue;
650                    }
651                    if (event.type() == K8sObserver.ResponseType.DELETED
652                        || permissions(vmDef, connection.session()).isEmpty()) {
653                        connection.respond(
654                            new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
655                        continue;
656                    }
657                } else {
658                    // Check if VM is used by pool conlet or to be assigned to
659                    // it
660                    var user
661                        = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(connection.session())
662                            .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
663                    var toBeUsedByConlet = vmDef.assignedFrom()
664                        .map(p -> p.equals(model.get().name())).orElse(false)
665                        && vmDef.assignedTo().map(u -> u.equals(user))
666                            .orElse(false);
667                    if (!Objects.areEqual(model.get().assignedVm(),
668                        vmDef.name()) && !toBeUsedByConlet) {
669                        continue;
670                    }
671
672                    // Now unassigned if VM is deleted or no longer to be used
673                    if (event.type() == K8sObserver.ResponseType.DELETED
674                        || !toBeUsedByConlet) {
675                        updateVmDef(connection, model.get(), null);
676                        continue;
677                    }
678                }
679
680                // Full update because permissions may have changed
681                updatePreview(connection, model.get(), vmDef);
682            }
683        }
684    }
685
686    /**
687     * On vm pool changed.
688     *
689     * @param event the event
690     * @param channel the channel
691     * @throws InterruptedException 
692     */
693    @Handler(namedChannels = "manager")
694    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.AvoidInstantiatingObjectsInLoops")
695    public void onVmPoolChanged(VmPoolChanged event)
696            throws InterruptedException {
697        var poolName = event.vmPool().name();
698        // Update known conlets
699        for (var entry : conletIdsByConsoleConnection().entrySet()) {
700            var connection = entry.getKey();
701            for (var conletId : entry.getValue()) {
702                var model = stateFromSession(connection.session(), conletId);
703                if (model.isEmpty()
704                    || model.get().mode() != ResourceModel.Mode.POOL
705                    || !Objects.areEqual(model.get().name(), poolName)) {
706                    continue;
707                }
708                if (event.deleted()
709                    || permissions(event.vmPool(), connection.session())
710                        .isEmpty()) {
711                    connection.respond(
712                        new DeleteConlet(conletId, Collections.emptySet()));
713                    continue;
714                }
715                updateConfig(connection, model.get(), null);
716            }
717        }
718    }
719
720    @Override
721    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidDecimalLiteralsInBigDecimalConstructor",
722        "PMD.ConfusingArgumentToVarargsMethod", "PMD.NcssCount",
723        "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition" })
724    protected void doUpdateConletState(NotifyConletModel event,
725            ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model) throws Exception {
726        event.stop();
727        if ("selectedResource".equals(event.method())) {
728            selectResource(event, channel, model);
729            return;
730        }
731
732        Optional<VmData> vmData = getVmData(model, channel);
733        if (vmData.isEmpty()) {
734            if (model.mode() == ResourceModel.Mode.VM) {
735                return;
736            }
737            if ("start".equals(event.method())) {
738                // Assign a VM.
739                var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(channel.session())
740                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse(null);
741                vmData = Optional.ofNullable(appPipeline
742                    .fire(new AssignVm(model.name(), user)).get());
743                if (vmData.isEmpty()) {
744                    // TODO message
745                    return;
746                }
747            }
748        }
749
750        // Handle command for selected VM
751        var vmChannel = vmData.get().channel();
752        var vmDef = vmData.get().definition();
753        var vmName = vmDef.metadata().getName();
754        var perms = permissions(model, channel.session(), null, vmDef);
755        var resourceBundle = resourceBundle(channel.locale());
756        switch (event.method()) {
757        case "start":
758            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.START)) {
759                fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Running", vmChannel));
760            }
761            break;
762        case "stop":
763            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.STOP)) {
764                fire(new ModifyVm(vmName, "state", "Stopped", vmChannel));
765            }
766            break;
767        case "reset":
768            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.RESET)) {
769                confirmReset(event, channel, model, resourceBundle);
770            }
771            break;
772        case "resetConfirmed":
773            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.RESET)) {
774                fire(new ResetVm(vmName), vmChannel);
775            }
776            break;
777        case "openConsole":
778            if (perms.contains(VmDefinition.Permission.ACCESS_CONSOLE)) {
779                var user = WebConsoleUtils.userFromSession(channel.session())
780                    .map(ConsoleUser::getName).orElse("");
781                var pwQuery
782                    = Event.onCompletion(new GetDisplayPassword(vmDef, user),
783                        e -> openConsole(vmDef, channel, model,
784                            e.password().orElse(null)));
785                fire(pwQuery, vmChannel);
786            }
787            break;
788        default:// ignore
789            break;
790        }
791    }
792
793    @SuppressWarnings({ "PMD.AvoidLiteralsInIfCondition",
794        "PMD.UseLocaleWithCaseConversions" })
795    private void selectResource(NotifyConletModel event,
796            ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model)
797            throws JsonProcessingException, InterruptedException {
798        try {
799            model.setMode(ResourceModel.Mode
800                .valueOf(event.<String> param(0).toUpperCase()));
801            model.setName(event.param(1));
802            String jsonState = objectMapper.writeValueAsString(model);
803            channel.respond(new KeyValueStoreUpdate().update(storagePath(
804                channel.session(), model.getConletId()), jsonState));
805            updatePreview(channel, model,
806                getVmData(model, channel).map(VmData::definition).orElse(null));
807        } catch (IllegalArgumentException e) {
808            logger.warning(() -> "Invalid resource type: " + e.getMessage());
809        }
810    }
811
812    private void openConsole(VmDefinition vmDef, ConsoleConnection connection,
813            ResourceModel model, String password) {
814        if (vmDef == null) {
815            return;
816        }
817        var addr = displayIp(vmDef);
818        if (addr.isEmpty()) {
819            logger
820                .severe(() -> "Failed to find display IP for " + vmDef.name());
821            return;
822        }
823        var port = vmDef.<Number> fromVm("display", "spice", "port")
824            .map(Number::longValue);
825        if (port.isEmpty()) {
826            logger
827                .severe(() -> "No port defined for display of " + vmDef.name());
828            return;
829        }
830        StringBuffer data = new StringBuffer(100)
831            .append("[virt-viewer]\ntype=spice\nhost=")
832            .append(addr.get().getHostAddress()).append("\nport=")
833            .append(port.get().toString())
834            .append('\n');
835        if (password != null) {
836            data.append("password=").append(password).append('\n');
837        }
838        vmDef.<String> fromVm("display", "spice", "proxyUrl")
839            .ifPresent(u -> {
840                if (!Strings.isNullOrEmpty(u)) {
841                    data.append("proxy=").append(u).append('\n');
842                }
843            });
844        if (deleteConnectionFile) {
845            data.append("delete-this-file=1\n");
846        }
847        connection.respond(new NotifyConletView(type(),
848            model.getConletId(), "openConsole", "application/x-virt-viewer",
849            Base64.getEncoder().encodeToString(data.toString().getBytes())));
850    }
851
852    private Optional<InetAddress> displayIp(VmDefinition vmDef) {
853        Optional<String> server = vmDef.fromVm("display", "spice", "server");
854        if (server.isPresent()) {
855            var srv = server.get();
856            try {
857                var addr = InetAddress.getByName(srv);
858                logger.fine(() -> "Using IP address from CRD for "
859                    + vmDef.getMetadata().getName() + ": " + addr);
860                return Optional.of(addr);
861            } catch (UnknownHostException e) {
862                logger.log(Level.SEVERE, e, () -> "Invalid server address "
863                    + srv + ": " + e.getMessage());
864                return Optional.empty();
865            }
866        }
867        var addrs = Optional.<List<String>> ofNullable(vmDef
868            .extra("nodeAddresses")).orElse(Collections.emptyList()).stream()
869            .map(a -> {
870                try {
871                    return InetAddress.getByName(a);
872                } catch (UnknownHostException e) {
873                    logger.warning(() -> "Invalid IP address: " + a);
874                    return null;
875                }
876            }).filter(a -> a != null).toList();
877        logger.fine(() -> "Known IP addresses for "
878            + vmDef.name() + ": " + addrs);
879        return addrs.stream()
880            .filter(a -> preferredIpVersion.isAssignableFrom(a.getClass()))
881            .findFirst().or(() -> addrs.stream().findFirst());
882    }
883
884    private void confirmReset(NotifyConletModel event,
885            ConsoleConnection channel, ResourceModel model,
886            ResourceBundle resourceBundle) throws TemplateNotFoundException,
887            MalformedTemplateNameException, ParseException, IOException {
888        Template tpl = freemarkerConfig()
889            .getTemplate("VmAccess-confirmReset.ftl.html");
890        channel.respond(new OpenModalDialog(type(), model.getConletId(),
891            processTemplate(event, tpl,
892                fmModel(event, channel, model.getConletId(), model)))
893                    .addOption("cancelable", true).addOption("closeLabel", "")
894                    .addOption("title",
895                        resourceBundle.getString("confirmResetTitle")));
896    }
897
898    @Override
899    protected boolean doSetLocale(SetLocale event, ConsoleConnection channel,
900            String conletId) throws Exception {
901        return true;
902    }
903
904    /**
905     * The Class AccessModel.
906     */
907    @SuppressWarnings("PMD.DataClass")
908    public static class ResourceModel extends ConletBaseModel {
909
910        /**
911         * The Enum ResourceType.
912         */
913        @SuppressWarnings("PMD.ShortVariable")
914        public enum Mode {
915            VM, POOL
916        }
917
918        private Mode mode;
919        private String name;
920        private String assignedVm;
921
922        /**
923         * Instantiates a new resource model.
924         *
925         * @param conletId the conlet id
926         */
927        public ResourceModel(@JsonProperty("conletId") String conletId) {
928            super(conletId);
929        }
930
931        /**
932         * Returns the mode.
933         *
934         * @return the resourceType
935         */
936        @JsonGetter("mode")
937        public Mode mode() {
938            return mode;
939        }
940
941        /**
942         * Sets the mode.
943         *
944         * @param mode the resource mode to set
945         */
946        public void setMode(Mode mode) {
947            this.mode = mode;
948        }
949
950        /**
951         * Gets the resource name.
952         *
953         * @return the string
954         */
955        @JsonGetter("name")
956        public String name() {
957            return name;
958        }
959
960        /**
961         * Sets the name.
962         *
963         * @param name the resource name to set
964         */
965        public void setName(String name) {
966            this.name = name;
967        }
968
969        /**
970         * Gets the assigned vm.
971         *
972         * @return the string
973         */
974        @JsonGetter("assignedVm")
975        public String assignedVm() {
976            return assignedVm;
977        }
978
979        /**
980         * Sets the assigned vm.
981         *
982         * @param name the assigned vm
983         */
984        public void setAssignedVm(String name) {
985            this.assignedVm = name;
986        }
987
988        @Override
989        public int hashCode() {
990            final int prime = 31;
991            int result = super.hashCode();
992            result = prime * result + java.util.Objects.hash(mode, name);
993            return result;
994        }
995
996        @Override
997        public boolean equals(Object obj) {
998            if (this == obj) {
999                return true;
1000            }
1001            if (!super.equals(obj)) {
1002                return false;
1003            }
1004            if (getClass() != obj.getClass()) {
1005                return false;
1006            }
1007            ResourceModel other = (ResourceModel) obj;
1008            return mode == other.mode
1009                && java.util.Objects.equals(name, other.name);
1010        }
1011
1012        @Override
1013        public String toString() {
1014            StringBuilder builder = new StringBuilder(50);
1015            builder.append("AccessModel [mode=").append(mode)
1016                .append(", name=").append(name).append(']');
1017            return builder.toString();
1018        }
1019    }
1020}
